name: ITSecMedia BRD Schuldenuhr
author: CoinInvest / ITSecMedia

sections.description:
Easy to customize Bundesrepublik Deutschland Schuldenuhr mit pro-Kopf Verschuldung as WordPress-Widget

This wordpress plugin is maintained by ITSecMedia on behalf of https://www.coininvest.com/.
The plugin homepage is https://www.coininvest.com/wiki/de/staatsverschuldung-schuldenuhr-deutschland/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload ism-schuldenuhr to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Appearance > Widgets
  4. To activate the widget drag it to a sidebar or click on it.
sections.faq:
How to change the layout

Change the default basic style via CSS which can be found in the CSS subfolder of the plugin.
/ism-schuldenuhr/css/default.css

How to change the initial numbers

Edit the configuration values here:
/ism-schuldenuhr/js/ism-schuldenuhr.json
